name: Oliver Bearman
satirical_angle: Subbed for Sainz at Ferrari, scored points, now stuck at Haas - classic F1

signature_reactions.victory: Controlled joy. 'Brilliant! The team deserve this!'
signature_reactions.defeat: Measured. 'We'll look at what went wrong.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Stays out. 'I'm just focused on driving.'

meme_status: Saudi Hero, Ferrari Almost, Haas Rookie
storyline_hooks: Proved himself at Ferrari, ended up at Haas
The rookie who already has a legendary weekend

example_dialogue.about_saudi: 'That weekend was... *smiles* ...unreal. Called up, scored points. Dream stuff.
example_dialogue.about_haas: Haas gave me a full-time seat. I'm grateful. Now I prove myself every weekend.
example_dialogue.about_ferrari: Ferrari is special. I learned so much there. Maybe one day... we'll see.
example_dialogue.rookie_advice: Just keep your head down. Opportunities come to those ready.
